name: Legend of Jump Jump
description:
Made For Driftwood Gaming 6th Jam with Pixel Game Maker MV!

Help a bunny named Jump Jump rescue back his freshly stolen carrots.

THEMES: 

- Silent Protagonist/Antagonist

- Dungeon Crawler

CONTROLS:

- A / X / Space / Return to confirm

- Left / Right (Arrows/D pad/L stick) to move

- F4 to switch between windowed and full screen

- Alt + F5 to reset the game

- Esc to pause game

CREDITS:

Developer - Baz

Music - Hyblitz / Alex / Matthew Pablo

Special thanks to PGMMV and Time Fantasy communities for playtests!
